00043 // set php-gettext library
00044 require LANGUAGES_BASE_DIR.'php-gettext'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'gettext.inc';
00045 
00046 // gettext setup
00047 $locale = $sysconf['default_lang'];
00048 $domain = 'messages';
00049 $encoding = 'UTF-8';
00050 
00051 // set language to use
00052 T_setlocale(LC_ALL, $locale);
00053 // set locales dictionary location
00054 _bindtextdomain($domain, LANGUAGES_BASE_DIR.'locale');
00055 // codeset
00056 _bind_textdomain_codeset($domain, $encoding);
00057 // set .mo filename to use
00058 _textdomain($domain);
00059 
00060 // Array with available translations
00061 // $available_languages[] = array('CODE', __('ENGLISH NAME'), 'NATIVE NAME');
00062 $available_languages[] = array('de_DE', __('German'), 'Deutsch');
00063 $available_languages[] = array('en_US', __('English'), 'English');
00064 $available_languages[] = array('id_ID', __('Indonesian'), 'Indonesia');
00065 ?>
